quote: Even when the lightening flashes inside them we say they are only clouds and turn our attention to the next meal, the next pain, the next breath, the next page. This is how we go on.
quote_letters: EVEN WHEN THE LIGHTENING FLASHES INSIDE THEM WE SAY THEY ARE ONLY CLOUDS AND TURN OUR ATTENTION TO THE NEXT MEAL THE NEXT PAIN THE NEXT BREATH THE NEXT PAGE THIS IS HOW WE GO ON
